remarks: The last symbol of the left (nonempty) half of a concatenated word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Oct-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2020.)
statement: ccatval1lsw $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V /\ A =/= (/) ) -> ( ( A ++ B ) ` ( ( # ` A ) - 1 ) ) = ( lastS ` A ) ) $.
